name: Anuu
description:
In Anuu, you play a shaman who will guide lost souls, explore, and discover the truth about the significance of his journey on this land.

This game demo was made by Timéo LEBOT and Kevin COUTAND. This project is a school project given by e-artsup. The subject was to build a platformer from scratch on Construct 3 in 2 months. 

We decided to create a project that can represent our skills in game creation. Kevin was mostly on the Game Art aspect and Timéo on Narrative Design, Game Design and Game Development. 

Because it’s impossible to create an entire game in only 2 months, we had to use references and sometimes make difficult decisions. All the stuff used here is not free to use. We know... But this project is still a school project. We'll never sell it or anything else. It’s a demonstration made by students, not a commercial use. 

Thank you for your comprehension.
